name: To-do Dash: A Notion Template
description: A simple To-Do Dash with a count of each completed to-do for the day. Create recurring tasks, lists, events, routines, or habit days.Looking for a simple way to stay on top of your daily tasks and to-dos? The Notion To-Do Dash has got you covered. With a count of each completed task for the day, you'll be able to track your progress and stay motivated as you work through your list.This template allows you to create recurring tasks, lists, events, routines, and habit days with ease.
